Package it.polimi.ingsw.View

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI
public class GUI
extends javafx.application.Application
This class represents the Graphic Unit Interface of the game, contains the different attributes of the multiple scene and the setting of the JavaFX scene
